QuestData.Title: Saving Princess Stillpine
QuestData.Description: Help me, $n! The Bristlelimb captured me and are planning to sacrifice me to their foul gods!$B$BHigh Chief Bristlelimb holds the key that opens the cage. To force him to appear, you must slaughter the evil Bristlelimb furbolgs that inhabit the enclave, just two camps to the west of this camp. If you kill enough of them, he will surely come for vengeance! When he shows up, kill him and get the key!$B$BMy father will richly reward you if you can save me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Release Princess Stillpine from her cage and then speak with Stillpine Ambassador Frasaboo at Blood Watch.$B$BYou must kill High Chief Bristlelimb for the key that opens the cage.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't have much longer, $N. They will kill me soon...
QuestData.RewardText: Once again you have proven yourself to be all that was prophesied. You have the eternal gratitude of the high chief $n -- and these Stillpine relics to choose from...
